features.featureDescription: Service produces resource logs that can provide enhanced service-specific metrics and logging. The customer can configure these resource logs and send them to their own data sink like a storage account or log analytics workspace.
features.featureGuidance: Enable resource logs for the Virtual Wan service and related resources. A variety of resource logs are available for Virtual WAN and can be configured for the Virtual WAN resource with Azure portal. You can choose to send to Log Analytics, stream to an event hub, or to simply archive to a storage account. Resource logs are supported for both ExpressRoute and P2S/S2S VPNs.
features.customerActionsDescription: Enable network logging for security investigation
